Container.Name: DayZ
Container.Overview:
This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install DayZ and run it.
**Keep in mind that you have to connect with the experimental branch Client to this Docker container!**
Initial Server Name: Docker DayZ Initial connection Password: Docker Initial admin Password: adminDocker
**GAME CONFIG & SAVE FOLDER**: Your saves are located in .../appdata/dayz/saves/ and your config file is located at .../appdata/dayz/saves/serverDZ.cfg (please note that changes to the serverDZ.cfg in the main directory take no effect, you have to edit the file .../saves/serverDZ.cfg)
**ATTENTION:** First Startup can take very long since it downloads the gameserver files!
Update Notice: Simply restart the container if a newer version of the game is available.
You can also run multiple servers with only one SteamCMD directory!

Config.Name: GAME_ID
Config.Description: The GAME_ID that the container downloads at startup. If you want to install a static or beta version of the game change the value to: '1042420 -beta YOURBRANCH' (without quotes, replace YOURBRANCH with the branch or version you want to install).

Config.Name: GAME_PARAMS
Config.Description: Enter your extra start up commands for the server here otherwise leave empty.

Config.Name: Validate Installation
Config.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

Config.Name: UDP1 - GamePort
Config.Description: UDP Game Port (If you need another port delete this Entry and create a new UDP port mapping with the corresponding port | also don't forget to click on show more and change the GAME_PORT)

Config.Name: Defalut Game Port
Config.Description: Only change if you know what you are doing (initial GAME_PORT | Dont forget to create create a new UDP port mapping with the corresponding port and delete the default port)

Config.Name: Steam-Username
Config.Description: Your Steam username goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Config.Name: Steam-Password
Config.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Config.Description: Only change if you know what you are doing!
